This unit adjusts standard controls of your Delphi application to the Windows XP design.

Just add "XPdesign" to one uses-clause of your projekt and
-if XP's design is aktivated, your application will follow
-if not, or an older OS is running, your program has the old design.

And don't forget adding this directory to the library path.




Newest infos at http://finish.at/XPdesign
